SensorReading.title: SensorReading
SensorReading.description: Represents a single sensor reading from the cement plant.

id.description: Unique identifier for the sensor reading.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the sensor reading.

sensorId.description: Identifier of the sensor that generated the reading.

value.description: The value of the sensor reading.

RawMaterialBatch.title: RawMaterialBatch
RawMaterialBatch.description: Represents a batch of raw materials used in the cement production process.

id.description: Unique identifier for the raw material batch.

analysisTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the raw material analysis.

batchId.description: Identifier of the raw material batch.

composition.description: Chemical composition of the raw material batch as JSON string.

ProductionMetric.title: ProductionMetric
ProductionMetric.description: Represents aggregated production metrics for the cement plant.

id.description: Unique identifier for the production metric record.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the production metric.

feed_rate.description: Raw material feed rate in tons per hour

lsf.description: Lime Saturation Factor, a quality indicator for the raw mix.

cao.description: Percentage of Calcium Oxide (CaO) in the raw mix.

sio2.description: Percentage of Silicon Dioxide (SiO2) in the raw mix.

al2o3.description: Percentage of Aluminum Oxide (Al2O3) in the raw mix.

fe2o3.description: Percentage of Iron(III) Oxide (Fe2O3) in the raw mix.

c3s.description: Percentage of Tricalcium Silicate (C₃S) in the clinker.

c2s.description: Percentage of Dicalcium Silicate (C₂S) in the clinker.

c3a.description: Percentage of Tricalcium Aluminate (C₃A) in the clinker.

c4af.description: Percentage of Tetracalcium Aluminoferrite (C₄AF) in the clinker.

AiRecommendation.title: AiRecommendation
AiRecommendation.description: Represents an AI-generated recommendation for optimizing cement production.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AI recommendation.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the AI recommendation.

implementationStatus.description: The implementation status of the AI recommendation.

actualOutcomes.description: Actual outcomes after implementing the recommendation, as JSON string.

id.description: Unique identifier for the cement plant.

name.description: The name of the cement plant.

location.description: The location of the cement plant.

type.description: The type of the cement plant (e.g., Integrated Dry Process).

productionCapacityTpd.description: The production capacity of the cement plant in tons per day.

commissionedDate.description: The date when the cement plant was commissioned.

Alert.title: Alert
Alert.description: Represents an alert generated by the system.

severity.description: The severity of the alert (e.g., CRITICAL, WARNING).

sensorId.description: The ID of the sensor that triggered the alert.

value.description: The value of the sensor at the time of the alert.

status.description: The status of the alert (e.g., new, acknowledged).

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the system.

email.description: The email address of the user.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

role.description: The role of the user (e.g., operator, engineer, admin).

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

plantIds.description: References to Plants. (Relationship: User N:N Plant)

definition.description: Stores the single, most recent live metric reading for the entire plant.
Stores historical production metrics. Each document is a snapshot in time.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.
